---
title: "Analysis Overview"
---

The following analyses were run adjusted for baseline age and sex. Baseline models adjusted for cohort using A4 vs LEARN/SF, while longitudinal models adjusted for cohort using A4 Placebo vs A4 Treated vs LEARN/SF. PACC models additionally adjusted for education and p-tau217 models additionally adjusted for BMI.

Models highlighted in orange yielded significant results after FDR correction.

**1. Baseline PACC**

+ PACC ~ Gene
+ PACC ~ Gene x Sex
+ PACC ~ Gene x E4
+ PACC ~ Gene x Sex x E4
+ PACC ~ Gene x Amyloid
+ PACC ~ Gene x Sex x Amyloid

+ Amyloid ~ Gene
+ Amyloid ~ Gene x Sex
+ Amyloid ~ Gene x E4
+ Amyloid ~ Gene x Sex x E4
